title: 1998 International 4900 (DEF Converted)
item_description:
1998 International 4900 (DEF Converted)

  • Manufacturer: International
  • Model: 4900
  • Vin: 1HTSDADN4WH599233
  • License: 8Y87837 
    • Registration Expiration: 9/30/2021
    • Planned Non-Op REGISTRATION DEFERRED
  • GVWR: 40,000 Lbs
  • Odometer Reads: 121,131
  • Axels: 2
  • Transmission: Spicer 10 Speed Manual
  • Diesel Emission Control Type: Selective Catalytic Reduction (Uses DEF Fluid)
  • Number of Tires: 6
  • Tire Size: 11R22.5
  • Brake Type: Air
  • Suspension Type: Leaf
  • Engine: Cummins Inline 6 (B6.7 240)
  • Fuel Type: Diesel
  • Hitch Type: Pintle
  • Features:
    • Air Conditioning

Note: Certificate of Title, Transfer Form, and Court Order will be mailed once the court order is received and the DMV paperwork is signed by the bankruptcy trustee. Please allow 1-2 weeks after the removal. Thank you for your patience. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of registration, transfer, sales tax, and fees due to the DMV.

links.detail: The target is an image representing the item. The content-type specified determines the format of the image returned. image/png, image/jpeg, or image/gif are acceptable content-types.
